author: Gremlin
itunes:author: Gremlin
itunes:summary: This episode we speak with Paul Osman, who leads the Site Reliability Engineering team at Under Armour. Topics include: Paul’s beginnings in Chaos Engineering at 500 Pixels, Reliability Engineering at Pager Duty, bootstrapping the Chaos Engineering program at Under Armour, patterns for reliable distributed systems, and tips for spinning up a Chaos Engineering program.
